name: NSImageView.FrameStyle
desc: Constants that allow you to specify the kind of frame bordering the image.

items.name: case photo
items.desc: A thin black outline and a dropped shadow.

items.name: case grayBezel
items.desc: A gray, concave bezel that makes the image look sunken.

items.name: case groove
items.desc: A thin groove that looks etched around the image.

items.name: case button
items.desc: A convex bezel that makes the image stand out in relief, like a button.
